entities.name: firebolt
entities.description: The Firebolt is a broomstick used by wizards for flying and playing Quidditch. It is mentioned as being turned towards Ron.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a lone figure at the far end of the pitch, hovering before the three goal hoops while the massive Warrington pelted toward him. He is being described as a player in Quidditch.

entities.name: warrington
entities.description: Warrington is a player who has the Quaffle and is heading for goal, out of Bludger range with just the Keeper ahead. He is being described as a player in Quidditch.

entities.name: quaffle
entities.description: The Quaffle is a ball used in Quidditch, mentioned as being possessed by Warrington.

entities.name: bludger
entities.description: Bludgers are objects used in Quidditch to disrupt play. They are mentioned as being out of range for Warrington.

entities.name: keeper
entities.description: The Keeper is a player who is ahead of Warrington, described as the only one between him and goal.

relationships.description: Warrington has possession of the Quaffle, heading for goal with it.
The Keeper is ahead of Warrington, described as the only one between him and goal.
